title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. If a small image, such as an icon, is opened, the scrollbars are misleading because they do not affect the view.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled and not movable, as they currently are.
SR: 1. Launch Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only). 2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved. 4. Open a small image, such as an icon. 5. Verify that the scrollbars are not disabled and still movable, which is misleading as they do not affect the view.
